name: Silhouette (itch) (greenCola)
description:
Silhouette is a bullet time game where the bullets are so fast they travel to and from the screen almost instantly. The enemies spawn in clusters and the game is endless. 

Shoot explosive barrels to send an explosion, killing anything in its wake.

Controls: S to slide, SPACE to jump, LEFT CLICK to shoot, SHIFT to slow down time.
